Package: org.ajoberstar.grgit.service

[Groovy] Class ResolveService

    • org.ajoberstar.grgit.service.ResolveService

    • Convenience methods to resolve various objects.

      Since:
      0.2.2

      • Constructor Summary

          Constructors 
          Constructor and description
          ResolveService (Repository repository)

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          Branch toBranch(java.lang.Object object)
          Resolves a branch from the given object.
          Commit toCommit(java.lang.Object object)
          Resolves the given revision string to a commit given the current state of the repository.
          java.lang.String toRevisionString(java.lang.Object object)
          Resolves a revision string that corresponds to the given object.
          Tag toTag(java.lang.Object object)
          Resolves a tag from the given object.

      • Inherited Methods Summary

          Inherited Methods 
          Methods inherited from class Name

      • Constructor Detail

        • ResolveService(Repository repository)

      • Method Detail

        • Branch toBranch(java.lang.Object object)

          Resolves a branch from the given object. Can handle any of the following types:

          • java.lang.String
          Returns:
          the corresponding commit
          Parameters:
          object - the object to resolve

        • Commit toCommit(java.lang.Object object)

          Resolves the given revision string to a commit given the current state of the repository. Any Git revision string should be supported.

          throws:
          GrgitException if there was a problem finding the commit
          deprecated:
          replaced by ResolveService.toCommit
          Returns:
          the commit represented by revstr
          Parameters:
          revstr - a revision string representing the desired commit
          See Also:
          gitrevisions Manual Page

        • java.lang.String toRevisionString(java.lang.Object object)

          Resolves a revision string that corresponds to the given object. Can handle any of the following types:

          • Commit
          • Tag
          • Branch
          • java.lang.String
          Returns:
          the corresponding commit
          Parameters:
          object - the object to resolve

        • Tag toTag(java.lang.Object object)

          Resolves a tag from the given object. Can handle any of the following types:

          • java.lang.String
          Returns:
          the corresponding commit
          Parameters:
          object - the object to resolve
